website_summaries.verdict: The Beats Solo Pro headphones delivers quality noise cancellation with a bass-forward, but relatively balanced, sound signature.
pros: Powerful audio performance with boosted bass and sculpted highs
Solid noise cancellation blocks out low-frequency rumble
Voice control option for iOS devices

customer_reviews.title: Beats Solo Pro
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling is really good, not the best ever, but really good, they look great, charge holds for HOURS, comfortable, ns the transparency mode is insane
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Design but average sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for a pair of headphones to replace my older Bose QC 35 (1) headphones and really loved the look of these headphones and when they arrived they did not disappoint. The packaging and style was faultless, what you'd expect from Apple and I was quite excited! However when I compared the audio to my old headphones I wasn't blwon away. I played music on the beats for a few days to bed them in but they were lacking for me. It's obviously a personal choice and other users will disagree but the beats will be going back I'm afraid. I continue the search to replace the headphones, will now look towards the Sony headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Wombat

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and does what it says. it blocks out sound really well. great sound, they look good, they arent oversized in any way. they have a unique extension for both sides. bluetooth, to turn on you unfold them and they automatically ask your phone to connect. great packaging aswell. well designed box and pouch for the headphones. they are expensive but thats my only bad opinion about them - the price
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones with one flaw...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones that are activated by unfolding them. Unfold them to turn them on, fold them up to turn them off. This sounds great at first until you wanna wear them around your neck. The headphones have to remain switched on while being worn around the neck which is a waste of battery life. Sound quality is very good. Build quality is premium and the noise cancellation is very good indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Str8jackit

customer_reviews.title: unstable product
customer_reviews.text: I just retuned my second item back. it is not I dont like it. I love it soooo much . the color, the cancellation and quality of music are all fantastic. but the first item I got was with a defected battery that I thought It was just a unlucky case. then I got a replaced one. the second one was with good battery but it comes with noise in the left side sometimes since I got it. maybe it still need more test to run for a new product. now I m almost give up with solo pro. but I hate this... coz I love it when there is no problem with new item.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding performance
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting Beats for some time now these are exceptional 1 very well packaged 2 very easy to set up set up automatically to your iPhone 3 noise cancelling is top notch 4 Superior Sound quality 5 extremely comfortable 6 listened to Beethoven to Pink Floyd. Eminem . 50 Cent . Guns N’ Roses. And a hell of a lot more There is no distortion whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Allan micheal jackets

customer_reviews.title: Complete review
customer_reviews.text: The Beats solo pros are a good headset, the sound quality in calls are crisp,the noise cancellation performs well, however I’ve noticed after clicking the noise cancellation button either to turn it off or on it Sometimes fails and needs to reconnect to my phone again.The comfort the head phones give you is subpar I have small ears and they tend to not sit well on the pads I can’t listen for more than a few hours my ears turn red each time. Although this is the case , the noise quality is clean.as one package having the clean noise quality,the noise cancellation and the extremely well done bluetooth Thisbe makes for a nice pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Maximiliano

customer_reviews.title: Fab !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them.. i have a coNstruction site for new houses just at the back of my house and the noise was driving g me mad! It is now bliss except for the vibration from the diggers 😀.. best thing Ive bought in ages. The transient noise bit also works well although the sound quality dose dip a little.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: No Wind Proof!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware this headphone is not wind proof. The wind goes inside the headphones making lots of noice. Contacted Apple and suggested to order another one in case it’s a falta one. Ordered the same model and the same problem. Don’t get me wrong, the sound is amazing and pairs very easily with any apple devices but my rating is so low due to the noise cancelling when it is windy/breeze that you can’t hear any song or talk to someone. I think Apple should re-design this headphones.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones...they were bought as a present for my 11 year old son and he loves them...the sound is good and easy to set up...I personally think the sound on my Bose QC35’s are better though...but then again I’m not 11
customer_reviews.author: Tony Whitby

customer_reviews.title: Right side don’t work as it should ...
customer_reviews.text: The right side headphone don’t work all the time since I took it out of the box i put it on charge for about 2 hours then I try to use it and the right side keeps cutting out the music I have playing so I can hear left side perfect and right side turns it self on and off I tried everything and no luck very bad please watch out !
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Pretty impressed to be fair Always had beats in ear or active Shifted after to stenheisser (sic) and bose but they broke to easy Gave these a go and very pleasantly surprised. Cancellation is great and sound good also. Only complaint would be that not the most comfortable when running, can move about a bit. All round though, decent purchase tbf
customer_reviews.author: Jgn1982

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of headphones WHEN they decide to connect
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for almost a week now but as nice as they are, they're really frustrating when you try to connect them to the macbook pro or iphone. Sometimes they connect othertimes you need to restart your bluetooth settings to get them to work.. which totally nullfies the point of the h1 chip!
customer_reviews.author: Fahad Maniar

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For reasons I cannot understand, these headphones stop working after 30 minutes of music. I have to turn off and on again and then again after 30 minutes it suddenly stops. Also to be fair, sound quality sounds the same as my £20 earphones. Returning the item
customer_reviews.author: Lara Santos

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to the point of returning them
customer_reviews.text: After hearing positive things, I was looking to upgrade my old Beats Solo headphones, and wanted the noise-cancelling options. However, after only a few days, I had to return these as they were just unbearably uncomfortable as they sit on your ears and press down hard. They worked OK, sound quality wasn't great, but after going with the new Sony XM4, I couldn't be happier to finally leave Beats behind me. if you want proper headphones, get the Sony XM4, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Webb

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to these from my old Beats Solo wireless and they're amazing. The sound quality is perfect and they're so comfortable to wear. Connection to my iPhone XR is so easy and I love being able to alter the noise cancelling as well. You can't hear any background noise when they're on full noise cancelling, would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great as is the noise cancelling feature. Only downside is they scratch easy and when you wear them in the gym this is bound to happen. Also your ears sweat a lot but the quality is awesome and brand lives up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Tony Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Solo pro beats brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are very easy to use. Sound quality is excellent. Pairing to the phone is very easy. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hepworth

customer_reviews.title: Am happy and i recomend it to every body
customer_reviews.text: It swiches off an on automatically It reduces 100% noice around you Battery lasts long enough Qood quality Made of quality product Comes with good packaging
customer_reviews.author: Guuleed297

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sexy
customer_reviews.text: It looks just as ivory as when I first got it, definitely an improvement on the solo3 which would squish your head. These aren’t Over ear but still comfortable. Best beats to date.
customer_reviews.author: lean

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them. I love them because I don’t have to listen to his rubbish !!! 😂
customer_reviews.author: steve gregory

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, and cancel out all background noice except for wind, storm Caria could not be silenced
customer_reviews.author: Kapp

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: The sound is really good but the clip is too strong so become uncomfortable after a while using it. The noise cancellation works pretty well
customer_reviews.author: LHPV

customer_reviews.title: Great colour and sound
customer_reviews.text: Great noise cancelling and love the Matt blue finish / let’s how They last longer than my first beats which Was two years
customer_reviews.author: Dr H

customer_reviews.title: Comfort wise it is not worth the penny!
customer_reviews.text: It is well built but you cannot wear it for longer duration as it gets very uncomfortable. Purchased it so that I could wear it for a longer period during office calls and the ears start turning red and painful if you wear it for more than 40 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as I expected. Bought only because I could pay in instalments. I think a good Sony or Bose headphones would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The product was very good. The voice cancellation and sound quality perfect . But the size is very small for me and my phone is samsung so hard to identify the battery level.
customer_reviews.author: Munees

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, seamless connection to iPhone, noise cancelling and transparency are great, I wear them out exercising and no issues at all Connect and disconnect automatically when you fold them up, charge is lightning fast and battery lasts for ages Great product
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi UK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty damn amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable pair out there but they look amazing and sound amazing! Much much better than previous gens and have just perfect build quality, these will last you a while.
customer_reviews.author: Zalan Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charging no more
customer_reviews.text: What can I say good item I was excited to received them I use them also put on charge twice and when I have to charge them for the 3rd time won’t charging no more. My beats solo pro completely stop working they even won’t charging
customer_reviews.author: Nicolae Comaritan

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Beats are flawless. Sound quality is great but got this specific pair for the DNC quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST BEATS HEADPHONES EVER MADE
customer_reviews.text: excellent overall. build quality is excellent. sound is great as-well as ANC
customer_reviews.author: Kealan Geraghty

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use these to watch netflix in bed they are great . Good sound quality and easy to connect to devices
customer_reviews.author: judi1670

customer_reviews.title: Great beats headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good in this beats I love them but the only bad thing is they are to tight your ears start hurting after a while but other than that they are great
customer_reviews.author: Toseef Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Even significantly reduce noise when not playing music.
customer_reviews.text: Yep love 'em. Makes me actually want to just go and listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: THCH

customer_reviews.title: Beats Review
customer_reviews.text: Fast free delivery, product as described, great sound and extremely easy to pair with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Apple hates Windows
customer_reviews.text: One star only because apple hates Windows users, it's a nightmare to get it connected
customer_reviews.author: Martynas V.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Loved the overall design. Sound quality and anc are great !
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Calvert

customer_reviews.title: Solo pro
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 5 days, I would suggest you buy them in the store instead of online
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Kerley

product_meta.title: Beats Solo Pro Wireless Noise Cancelling On-Ear Headphones - Apple H1 Headphone Chip, Class 1 Bluetooth, Active Noise Cancelling, Transparency, 22 Hours of Listening Time - Black
feature_bullets: Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) blocks external noise
Transparency helps you stay aware of your surroundings while listening
Features the Apple H1 Headphone Chip and Class 1 Bluetooth for extended range and fewer dropouts
Hands-free controls via “Hey Siri” on iOS devices, and voice capability with the push of the b button on a variety of compatible devices, you can stay in the zone
Up to 22 hours of listening time (up to 40 hours with ANC and Transparency turned off)
Fast Fuel provides 3 hours of playback from a 10-minute charge when battery is low
Auto On/Off when you unfold and fold your wireless bluetooth headphones
What’s in the box: Beats Solo Pro wireless noise cancelling headphones, Carrying case, Lightning to USB-A charging cable, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
